titles.title: A resolution designating February 14, 2004, as "National Donor Day".
A resolution designating February 14, 2004, as "National Donor Day".

action.text: Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: Designates February 14, 2004, as National Donor Day. Supports the goals and ideals of National Donor Day. Urges everyone to learn about the importance of organ, tissue, bone marrow, and blood donations and to discuss such donations with their families and friends.
